systemProperty.descriptionCdata: 673d1143-2c6a-40a2-a04e-c065ee59eef2.description=In LAB and QA this value should be TEST.\nIn Production this Value should be PROD.\nThis is used to turn customer EMAIL notifications off for testing Purposes. Please "/Library/My Ops Flows/Savvis-Production/SMA/application/Vantive CaseClosure" for a working example.
systemProperty.name: EAS_Send_Email_ON_OFF
